meanings.definition: After the usual or proper time
meanings.sent1: She arrived belatedly to the party, missing the cake cutting.
meanings.sent2: The train belatedly arrived at the station, causing delays for passengers.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy student belatedly realized the exam was yesterday.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed belatedly, just in time for the autumn festival.
meanings.sent5: The apology came belatedly, but it was heartfelt and sincere.

meanings.sent1: The belatedly delivered package finally arrived at the doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The belatedly submitted assignment received a lower grade due to the delay.
meanings.sent3: The belatedly starting team struggled to catch up in the game.
meanings.sent4: The belatedly announced decision surprised everyone in the office.
meanings.sent5: The belatedly planned party turned out to be a great success.
